name: Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales
description:
Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales is an arcade game developed by Papaya Studio. It came out on 19-10-2010. It was published by Disney Interactive.
Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales is available on PC.
It was produced by Kimberly Adams. Jeremy Lasky, John Lasseter and Rob Gibbs directed the game. It was scored by Bruno Coon, BT, Mark Mothersbaugh and Mark Watters.
